title: Pre-Service Teacher Workshop to Strengthen Inquiry-Based Social Studies Lesson Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding the Basic Secondary Social Studies Curriculum and Foundational Concepts of Instructional Design
context.additional_context: Emphasizes developing inquiry-based social studies lesson design competencies applicable in real educational settings for pre-service teachers. Participants access Zoom sessions via personal devices and perform project-based assessments using real-time collaboration tools

learning_goals: One can design a social studies inquiry lesson using the Inquiry Design Model (IDM) elements at least once.
One can develop three or more social studies inquiry questions connected to students' lives.
One can create a scenario for operating social studies inquiry lessons that include discussion-based activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
